name: Ashadee Ad Manager
author: Ashadee

sections.description: The Ashadee plugin for WordPress allows Malaysian bloggers to automatically add related ads from the Ashadee affiliate network. Based on the keywords you use in your content, ads are highly targeted and varies according to the page or post. The plugin is small and easy to use. All you need to input is your Ashadee affiliate username and a tracking code to identify your blog as the traffic source. Then just use the default settings or configure your own to start showing related affiliate links and ads on each post you write.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder jomniaga to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on Settings > Ashadee to configure your Ashadee plugin
sections.faq:
Do I need a Ashadee account?

Yes, if you don’t have one yet you can signup free at http://www.ashadee.com

Do I have to enter the keywords manually?

No. Our plugin detects keywords in your post automatically and matches it with related offers from the network.

Why do some merchants and offers not appear?

We frequently update the list of keywords and offers and reupload a new version of the plugin. Make sure you have the latest plugin at all times to get all new offers and keywords.

Where can I get more information on the Ashadee affiliate network?

To get help and view frequently asked questions, go to the help page at http://help.ashadee.com

short_description: Allows Malaysian bloggers to automatically add related ads from the Ashadee affiliate network, based on the keywords in your content.
description: The Ashadee plugin for WordPress allows Malaysian bloggers to automatically add related ads from the Ashadee affiliate network. Based on the keywords you use in your content, ads are highly targeted and varies according to the page or post. The plugin is small and easy to use. All you need to input is your Ashadee affiliate username and a tracking code to identify your blog as the traffic source. Then just use the default settings or configure your own to start showing related affiliate links and ads on each post you write.

screenshots.caption: Enter your Ashadee username, add tracking code, and select a category or choose Any Category by default
Display related affiliate offers at the bottom of each post, based on keywords used in that post
Choose where and how keywords should be automatically converted to your affiliate links
